00036 typedef struct
00037 {
00038         b3Float4 m_row[3];
00039 }b3Mat3x3;
00040 
00041 #define b3Mat3x3ConstArg const b3Mat3x3
00042 #define b3GetRow(m,row) (m.m_row[row])
00043 
00044 inline b3Mat3x3 b3QuatGetRotationMatrix(b3Quat quat)
00045 {
00046         b3Float4 quat2 = (b3Float4)(quat.x*quat.x, quat.y*quat.y, quat.z*quat.z, 0.f);
00047         b3Mat3x3 out;
00048 
00049         out.m_row[0].x=1-2*quat2.y-2*quat2.z;
00050         out.m_row[0].y=2*quat.x*quat.y-2*quat.w*quat.z;
00051         out.m_row[0].z=2*quat.x*quat.z+2*quat.w*quat.y;
00052         out.m_row[0].w = 0.f;
00053 
00054         out.m_row[1].x=2*quat.x*quat.y+2*quat.w*quat.z;
00055         out.m_row[1].y=1-2*quat2.x-2*quat2.z;
00056         out.m_row[1].z=2*quat.y*quat.z-2*quat.w*quat.x;
00057         out.m_row[1].w = 0.f;
00058 
00059         out.m_row[2].x=2*quat.x*quat.z-2*quat.w*quat.y;
00060         out.m_row[2].y=2*quat.y*quat.z+2*quat.w*quat.x;
00061         out.m_row[2].z=1-2*quat2.x-2*quat2.y;
00062         out.m_row[2].w = 0.f;
00063 
00064         return out;
00065 }
00066 
00067 inline b3Mat3x3 b3AbsoluteMat3x3(b3Mat3x3ConstArg matIn)
00068 {
00069         b3Mat3x3 out;
00070         out.m_row[0] = fabs(matIn.m_row[0]);
00071         out.m_row[1] = fabs(matIn.m_row[1]);
00072         out.m_row[2] = fabs(matIn.m_row[2]);
00073         return out;
00074 }

00095 __inline
00096 b3Mat3x3 mtZero()
00097 {
00098         b3Mat3x3 m;
00099         m.m_row[0] = (b3Float4)(0.f);
00100         m.m_row[1] = (b3Float4)(0.f);
00101         m.m_row[2] = (b3Float4)(0.f);
00102         return m;
00103 }
00104 
00105 __inline
00106 b3Mat3x3 mtIdentity()
00107 {
00108         b3Mat3x3 m;
00109         m.m_row[0] = (b3Float4)(1,0,0,0);
00110         m.m_row[1] = (b3Float4)(0,1,0,0);
00111         m.m_row[2] = (b3Float4)(0,0,1,0);
00112         return m;
00113 }
00114 
00115 __inline
00116 b3Mat3x3 mtTranspose(b3Mat3x3 m)
00117 {
00118         b3Mat3x3 out;
00119         out.m_row[0] = (b3Float4)(m.m_row[0].x, m.m_row[1].x, m.m_row[2].x, 0.f);
00120         out.m_row[1] = (b3Float4)(m.m_row[0].y, m.m_row[1].y, m.m_row[2].y, 0.f);
00121         out.m_row[2] = (b3Float4)(m.m_row[0].z, m.m_row[1].z, m.m_row[2].z, 0.f);
00122         return out;
00123 }
00124 
00125 __inline
00126 b3Mat3x3 mtMul(b3Mat3x3 a, b3Mat3x3 b)
00127 {
00128         b3Mat3x3 transB;
00129         transB = mtTranspose( b );
00130         b3Mat3x3 ans;
00131         //      why this doesn't run when 0ing in the for{}
00132         a.m_row[0].w = 0.f;
00133         a.m_row[1].w = 0.f;
00134         a.m_row[2].w = 0.f;
00135         for(int i=0; i<3; i++)
00136         {
00137 //      a.m_row[i].w = 0.f;
00138                 ans.m_row[i].x = b3Dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[0]);
00139                 ans.m_row[i].y = b3Dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[1]);
00140                 ans.m_row[i].z = b3Dot3F4(a.m_row[i],transB.m_row[2]);
00141                 ans.m_row[i].w = 0.f;
00142         }
00143         return ans;
00144 }
00145 
00146 __inline
00147 b3Float4 mtMul1(b3Mat3x3 a, b3Float4 b)
00148 {
00149         b3Float4 ans;
00150         ans.x = b3Dot3F4( a.m_row[0], b );
00151         ans.y = b3Dot3F4( a.m_row[1], b );
00152         ans.z = b3Dot3F4( a.m_row[2], b );
00153         ans.w = 0.f;
00154         return ans;
00155 }
00156 
00157 __inline
00158 b3Float4 mtMul3(b3Float4 a, b3Mat3x3 b)
00159 {
00160         b3Float4 colx = b3MakeFloat4(b.m_row[0].x, b.m_row[1].x, b.m_row[2].x, 0);
00161         b3Float4 coly = b3MakeFloat4(b.m_row[0].y, b.m_row[1].y, b.m_row[2].y, 0);
00162         b3Float4 colz = b3MakeFloat4(b.m_row[0].z, b.m_row[1].z, b.m_row[2].z, 0);
00163 
00164         b3Float4 ans;
00165         ans.x = b3Dot3F4( a, colx );
00166         ans.y = b3Dot3F4( a, coly );
00167         ans.z = b3Dot3F4( a, colz );
00168         return ans;
00169 }
